title: How I Found Confidence Through Fitness
content: This is where I talk about how I finally stopped making excuses and found the courage to move my body in ways I never thought possible. It started with five minutes a day, and slowly grew into something so much bigger. I’ll walk you through the early steps that helped me break through the fear.

title: What 'Fit-ish' Really Means
content: Being fit-ish doesn’t mean giving up—it means showing yourself grace. I used to think being healthy meant being perfect. But the moment I started forgiving myself for missed workouts, slip-ups, and messy days, I found freedom. Here’s what fit-ish looks like in my life today.
